title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: BidiUtil in win32 uses Class.forName() which needs to be addressed.
OB: The BidiUtil in win32 is currently using Class.forName() in an unknown way.
EB: The expected behavior is to update the code to use a more direct and reliable method for the specific task instead of Class.forName().
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Locate the code that uses Class.forName() in BidiUtil in win32.
2. Replace that code with: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), 'windowProc', 4)
3. Observe the behavior of the software to ensure it still functions as expected.
